description: Get all reviews from the Chrome Web Store

outputDescription.profileLink: The Google+ link of the review author
outputDescription.date: Time when the review was written/modified

spreadsheetUrl.label: Spreadsheet URL or an Extension URL <a href="api-store/6817/chrome-extension-review-extractor#section_4addagooglespreadsheet" target="_blank">(?)<a/>
spreadsheetUrl.helper: Enter either a Google Spreadsheet URL or a CSV URL (make sure your file is publicly available) or an Extension URL

columnName.label: Column name into the CSV/Spreadsheet used to reviews URLs
columnName.helper: If this field is empty, the API will fetch the first CSV column

extensionsPerLaunch.label: Number of extensions to scrape per launch
helpers: If this field is empty, the API will scrape only 2 extensions (default behaviour)
Please be gentle. Google can block the scraping, when scraping too many reviews. Scraping 3+ extensions with a huge amount of reviews is not recommended.
